resources.string: In the next screen, select the \"Services\" tab to activate the 139 Mailbox Automatical Configuring
Then click the switch on the top right corner, click the \"Confirm\" to continue.
"You're already using this username for the account \"%s\"."
An account with same name already exists
"This password starts or ends with one or more space characters. Many servers don't support passwords with spaces."
"%s requires that you update your security settings."
"The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device."
If you need to switch between POP3 and IMAP settings, delete your account and create a new one with your desired settings.
Edit brief messages to paste into emails
Username, password, and other server settings
"The username or password for %s is incorrect. Update them now?"
"Couldn't sign in to %s. The server said: %s"
Show notification when new email arrives
Sync calendar events for this account
What type of account is this?
Confirm username, password, and account settings are correct.
The certificate is invalid or inaccessible.
A client certificate is required. Do you want to connect to the server with a client certificate?
The server responded with an error. Check your username and password, then try again.
"\"Couldn't sign in. This account has been locked.\"​"
Set account as shown below or try signing in with EXCHANGE.
"You entered an incorrect server address or the server requires a protocol version that Mail doesn't support."
"Couldn't open connection to server due to security error."
"This server requires security features that your Android device doesn't support, including %s"
TLS required but not supported by server.
Your account has secondary password authentication. Authentication is required.
The server %s requires that you allow it to remotely control some security features of your Android device. Do you want to finish setting up this account?
Enter a valid email address and password.
Always show pictures from this sender
"Couldn't download the attachment for this message."
Connection speed too slow, try again later
"Don't have permissions to access external storage"
You may not have permission to open this file or the file may be damaged.
"Looks like the size exceeded the server's limit"
"Unfortunately, you can't save or open this type of attachment."
Choose which message to scroll to after deleting a message
139 Email Service Automatical Configuring can help you filling in the login information to the mailbox. Do you want to enable this feature?
Find the option \"139 Mailbox Automatical Configuring\", click it to start.
Turn on to receive automatic reminders
A repayment is due on %s, tap to view
Cancellation of any attachment being downloaded is not available to a POP3 type of account.
Stop displaying inline images from senders you previously allowed.
"There's no text in the message body."
Move all emails from this sender to Trash
Move emails with this recipient to Trash (only new emails)
Delete mail that includes this recipient in the To or Cc field
Touch a sender image to select that conversation.
"Could you tell us why you're removing this account?"
Enable mail service complete update and activate security settings
Mail service does not work with Exchange
"Can't auto-receive new messages. Sync is off."
"Can't auto-receive new messages. Sync is off."
The mail received %s ago will be deleted automatically. Tap to change.
"Can't download attachment. Not enough space on external storage."
Not enough space on internal storage.
"WARNING: Deactivating the Email app's permission to administer your device will delete all email accounts that require it, along with their messages, contacts, calendar events, and other data."
Notifications for emails that arrive will be silenced
Use mobile data connection to download this attachment?
Message is too big to download.

" This event has been canceled for: %s "
The details of this event have been changed for: %s
Describe the issue here. We will send you an email after we look into it.
Tap the button to send \"%s\" to all people in the conversation
Detects that you are using the mailbox, click Confirm for you to automatically fill 139 E-mail account and password.
"When configuring the 139 mailbox, don't operate the phone, in case of configuration failures."
"Clear this app's data in Settings > System apps and try again."
Use proxy server for Gmail Account
Use proxy server to access your Gmail Account?
"Couldn't authenticate account. Try adding this account again."
Password for incoming mail server is incorrect
Show promotions on top of the inbox
Touch & hold to select one conversation, then touch to select more.
This email is too big to load, only display part of it and please go through all on PC later
Load emails when using mobile data
Attachments in your forwarded message will be downloaded prior to sending.
Allow Mi Wallet to analyze and manage your bills automatically. This feature is turned off by default for work-related email addresses.
"By using this feature, you're agreeing to our "Terms of Service
Authentication failed, please check your network connection
Check network connection and try again
No app was found to open this attachment.
"Couldn't find any bills. Try switching to a different email account."
"Couldn't find emails containing tickets or bookings. Try a different inbox."
Possible through the network of China Mobile or SMS verification, may generate additional costs to flow or SMS.
Enter your Google Account username and password on the following sign-in page.
Get a passcode and sign in >
"Contact your email system's administrator and update your certificate."
Server authorization error while syncing outbox.
The maximum size of Email has been reached.
Insufficient storage in the mail server
Server provision error while syncing outbox.
An error occurred. Wait a minute or two and try again.
Very sorry that your mailbox is not configured successfully, open the floating Windows permissions and try again
Open floating Windows permissions, and immediately enjoy 139 mailbox to automatically configure the extreme experience.
You need to change your lock screen PIN or password soon, or the data for %s will be erased. Do you want to change it now?
"\"%s\" requires that you change your lock screen PIN or password."
The data for %s is being erased from your device. You can restore it by changing your lock screen PIN or password. Change it now?
Your lock screen PIN or password has expired.
Allows app to access your email, usernames, and passwords
"Allows app to read your emails' attachments"
Configuration fails, please allow calls and text messages during configuration permissions
"Analyze bills and travel info in your email to receive reminders about payments and trips"
Limit the number of calendar events synced
Limit the number of emails synced
Only allow manual sync while roaming
Require idle device to lock screen
Tap Activate to set up mail server.
In POP3, attachments will be automatically downloaded with email. This may increase your mobile data usage.
"Show profile pictures next to sender's name in inbox"
Tap the upper right corner to go to settings after you agree
Try using WPS Office to open this attachment.
Try using WPS Office to open this attachment.
No application found to handle this action
Signing in to the web QQ Mail. Enter independent password.
"Turn on password protection if you can't receive SMS"
Enter username and password to sign in >
Tap \"Send SMS\" to get a verification code
Signing in to the web QQ Mail. Enter your password.
Turn on password protection in your browser
"I'll read this later and get back to you."
"Let's set up a meeting to discuss this."
You booked a room at %1$s starting from %2$s/%3$s. Double check your booking before arriving there.
Flight %3$s (%1$s/%2$s) will take off soon. Double check your flight info.
Train %3$s (%1$s/%2$s) will depart soon. Double check your ticket.
Sync inbox less frequently while Do not disturb is on
Your emails should be less than %sMB
Add quick reply text to the message content?
Search terms must be greater than 3 characters
Account \"%s\" changed its security settings; no user action is required.
"Account \"%s\" can't be synced due to security requirements."
Select server sent items folder for %s
"Couldn't validate server certificate \u0009 (Make sure'Auto sync time' is turned on in Settings)"
Too many unsuccessful sign in attempts
<u>"I've read and agree with WPS Mail Service Agreement"</u>
Authentication fails, check whether the antivirus software to intercept SMS
Password for outgoing mail server is incorrect
"Your device doesn't have enough storage space to sync."
You need to sign in again
Tap to use proxy server for Gmail
"One or more files weren't attached. Size can't exceed %1$s."
"Changes you make to all apps and accounts, not just Gmail, will be synchronized between the web, your other devices, and your %1$s."
"You won't be able to receive reminders after you stop analyzing. Stop now?"
"Sent successfully, we'll get back to you soon."
Send error logs to help us improve Mail
"Can't verify account, check server settings for %s"
"This account isn't set up to sync automatically. Touch "Sync Now to sync mail once, or Change Sync Settings to set up this account to sync mail automatically.
You can try to sign in again
A certificate error occurred, proceed anyway?
The password you entered is incorrect
